title: Vendor approval risk thresholds
description: Defines which vendor approvals require escalation based on contract value and data exposure.
content: Vendor approvals above $250k or involving regulated data require a risk committee review. Exceptions must include a mitigation plan and evidence of data handling controls.

title: Change order approval ladder
description: Approval thresholds for project change orders and escalation owners.
content: Change orders below $50k can be approved by the project manager. $50k-$250k requires director approval. Above $250k triggers finance and legal review.

title: Claims exception escalation criteria
description: Defines what triggers human review on insurance claims.
content: Claims with conflicting incident reports, coverage gaps, or payouts above the 90th percentile must be reviewed by a supervisor before payout.

title: Finance exception routing
description: Routing rules for invoice exceptions and payment approvals.
content: Invoice exceptions under $10k can be approved by finance ops if documentation is complete. Missing documentation or totals above $10k require controller approval.

title: RAG citation integrity checklist
description: Checklist to ensure retrieval outputs remain auditable.
content: Every retrieved response must include the source document, section reference, and last review date. Objects without an owner are excluded from production retrieval.
